Text: Do this TV series still rape the books? I mean totaly destroys the plot that was in it?
Love this series,thanks eztv your the best.

Aluc, I think you have to consider this series as being seperate from the books and just happening in a world that looks like the one we know from the books.

I agree that the plotline of the series cant hold a candle to the original, but if you look at it without comparing then its decent entertainment.

The books are ridiculously derivative garbage used as a vehicle to peddle the hack author's far (and i mean FAR) right-wing ideology....but the TV series is great! First time i've ever been grateful that a TV series deviated wildly from it's source material.

The first season episode 'Cursed' is something of a mini-classic, imo.....Looking forward to more of the same - Thanks uploader! 

Very grateful to the EZTV crew....You really do set the standard.

Is there some reason why I always have a problem with eztv tracker but none of the others
I would like to download but keep getting problem connecting to tracker
meshullam....does it only happen with seeds downloaded from TPB, or does it also happen when you get them directly from the ez site?
yayayayayayaya thanks eztv been waiting for this awesome series to come back on :-)

wow libertasw... way to read way too much into FICTION books.  Great series of books to read, albeit he is a bit long-winded.  TV show is pretty decent, I've enjoyed the first season and look forward to this one.  Thx ez!
